creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: multicolored apron with very vibrant colors; center of apron is predominately green with decorations of blue flowers; apron center is bordered with vibrant and shiny designs; motifs of birds and flowers decorate the border; at the apron's top is an additional border of similar decorations; attached to the top edge are two magenta strips of cloth; ends of strips decorated with embroidery and tassels; tassels also found in top half of apron.
dimension: 25 x 19 13/16 in. (63.5 x 50.32 cm) (without cloth strips)
title: Apron
